util

Class DynamicCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.DynamicCompiler

  • public class DynamicCompiler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was copied from the location below and was created by david, the author of the article. This class is used to dynamically compile any .java classes in the directory for custom layer types. http://www.beyondlinux.com
    Author:
    david 2011/07

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DynamicCompiler.InMemoryJavaFileObject
      java File Object represents an in-memory java source file
      so there is no need to put the source file on hard disk
      static class  DynamicCompiler.MyDiagnosticListener
      This class will print diagnostic information about any failed compilations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String classOutputFolder
      The directory where all compiled classes will be saved.
      static java.lang.String name
      After a .java file is compiled, it will be saved as 'name.class'.

      compile your files by JavaCompiler.
      static javax.tools.JavaFileObject getJavaFileObject(java.lang.String javaFile)
      Get a simple Java File Object ,
      It is just for demo, content of the source code is dynamic in real use case
      static java.lang.Class instanceOf()

    • Field Detail

      • classOutputFolder

        public static java.lang.String classOutputFolder
        The directory where all compiled classes will be saved. This should be set before use.

      • name

        public static java.lang.String name
        After a .java file is compiled, it will be saved as 'name.class'. This parameter should be set before each use to ensure that .class files are named properly.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamicCompiler

        public DynamicCompiler()

    • Method Detail

      • getJavaFileObject

        public static javax.tools.JavaFileObject getJavaFileObject(java.lang.String javaFile)
        Get a simple Java File Object ,
        It is just for demo, content of the source code is dynamic in real use case
        Parameters:
        javaFile - the contents of the class to be compiled
        Returns:
        an instance of the JavaFileObject

      • compile

        public static void compile(java.lang.Iterable<? extends javax.tools.JavaFileObject> files)
                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        compile your files by JavaCompiler. If the class was succesfuly compiled, it will print 'Succeded'. Otherwise, it will print diagnositc information.
        Parameters:
        files - takes in an Arrays.asList of the JavaFileObject
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - this is thrown if the java file is run from a JRE instead of a JDK.

      • instanceOf

        public static java.lang.Class instanceOf()
        returns an instance of the compiled class, or null if the class could not be compiled.
        Returns:
        a Class object for the compiled class (ie, HistogramLayer.class).
